name: Coeus Solutions
description: Coeus Solutions GmbH was founded in 2003 with a small team of 20. It grew to a team of over 60 with offices in Berlin, Munich, Lahore, and a presence in Hamburg. Over this period we have had steady growth and are focused on keeping business fundamentals strong while building a steady long term client base. Most of our business comes from clients who have been working with us for years.
